website_summaries.verdict: This professional-grade serum utilizes the skin-brightening capabilities of vitamins C and E to lighten post-acne hyperpigmentation and help minimize the effects of sun damage.
pros: Formulated by skincare professionals to nourish and improve skin
In addition to vitamin C, this serum also contains vitamin E to brighten skin and even out tone and texture
This serum is lightweight and absorbs quickly
cons: A mild burning sensation is common
Can be drying for users with dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge
customer_reviews.text: I read about this product in a RealSimple magazine article about over the counter products recommended by dermatologists ("best drugstore beauty buys"). I've never used vitamin C+E before so I can't compare it with similar products, BUT I can say that I love this particular product and have noticed a more even skin tone since I've started using it. I hardly ever splurge on skin care products, but this was well worth it. It feels amazing when it goes on. My skin looks brighter and more evenly toned. I haven't had a single breakout since I started using it. Highly recommend! And the price on Amazon is great.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Gave me very bad acne
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a terrible outbreak of pimples on my face. I used as directed but after a few days, I had painful acne-like breakouts. I had to go to a dermatologist who told me to stop the product as Vitamin E can cause these type of breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Too drying- the worst vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Very drying for the skin. If you want a good vitamin C serum then use Vivier or dermatology brand. I was very upset after I got it that I was unable to return it too! I gave it one star only because I had to rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Slag

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for aging skin but you must use daily....cost keeps going up too!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the base goes on smoothly and evenly. it provides the vitamin c &e that skin needs to be healthy and fresh appearing. be sure to wash hands before touching around eyes
customer_reviews.author: CatPal

customer_reviews.title: ... using this product for years and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I am very happy with it. Besides being an antioxidant, it leaves my face smooth and after a small amount of sunscreen my foundation goes on very nicely and my skin looks even and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Whole Bottle Defective
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item online many times over the past decade plus. This is the first time I have received a product that is clearly not right. Whereas previous purchases had a "cream" texture, this one is watery and lacking any viscosity. Looking for seller to provide a replacement so we'll see how that goes. Would be happy to send this product back or provide pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Now we’re talking about it the crème de la crème of skin care
customer_reviews.text: Now we’re talking about it the crème de la crème of skin care! One of my favorite products hands-down this stuff is the bomb.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Provides skin with all the essential Vitamin C. Product goes on super smooth. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I broke out from using it and it burns my skin when I apply it. I am also very disappointed that I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: sdmc5080

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if it’s doing anything
customer_reviews.text: So, when I apply this on, my skin tingles and sort of hurts so I do not use it often (every other day.) I don’t see or feel a difference. Disappointing since I paid so much for these face products.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Question seller and changing product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased thus product for eight years. When this pump arrived, fluid appeared different and not absorbing as previously. Pump stopped working one week after purchase and in less than 30 days. Apparently cannot return or replace. Concerned and will nit purchase from thus seller.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Pocher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use SkinMedica Vitamin C Plus E Complex every morning after I cleanse my face. Then I apply a good sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: N. Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: Right now this is my favorite Vitamin C serum. It absorbs and doesn't leave a greasy film.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseK

customer_reviews.title: I'll continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It took my skin a few weeks to get use to this product but I really like it. Goes on smoothly, only takes a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this Vitamin C and E Complex,, I have used it for years and have seen great results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: haven't seen any huge changes yet but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best on market and does not leave my skin feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years, upon reccomendation of dermatologiist. Best on market and does not leave my skin feeling tacky. Works well under makeup and sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Cl

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Takes care of those ugly little lines ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Takes care of those ugly little lines around my mouth and overall gives a great smooth look. Does not irritate or cause any redness like many other products I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I also use their TNS serum
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the skin.. recommended by my dermatologist - but less expensive on Amazon !!
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Watch skin smooth out become a better texture
customer_reviews.text: You do need to use this product 60 days to see the difference, smoother silky face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I love, feels great and seems to make my skin healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: I also use retinol which is great also.
customer_reviews.text: The Vit C and E complex gives a glow to my skin. I also use retinol which is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has made a huge improvement to my skin. Extremely fast and worry free delivery. All around great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: When I received the product it looked like the sample and had the same tingly sensation when ...
customer_reviews.text: The product seems legit. I was first introduced to the product as a sample from a reputable retailer and wanted to buy it, but not at the listed price. I took a chance and ordered it through Amazon at a considerably less cost. When I received the product it looked like the sample and had the same tingly sensation when applied as the sample, so it leads me to believe the product is as promised. The only con I found was there is no tubing to dispense it, but if you do store it upside down, as another reviewer suggested, it will come out properly.
customer_reviews.author: cpete

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product happily since recommended by dermotologists in Real Simple magazine
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product happily since recommended by dermotologists in Real Simple magazine. Separately 2 friends and a stranger commented on the great tone of my skin - unsolicited advice to keep using! Seller was prompt and efficient, product arrived well packaged - all good!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kirvin

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Serum
customer_reviews.text: I'm not totally sure what exactly I was looking for in this product, so I'll just say my skin looks pretty good - but I assume there's more protection happening below the outside layers.
customer_reviews.author: KMSBarnes

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for a few weeks and it does not work the same as the same product I bought from a licensed dermatologist. It is supposed to tingle into skin and this product did not. It also has a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a terrific product. I’ve been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this product for over 15 year and love it. This combines with other Skin-Medica products will ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for over 15 year and love it. This combines with other Skin-Medica products will keep your skin young....even a former smoker and sun worshiper like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Destin Deano

product_meta.title: SkinMedica Vitamin C+E Complex, 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Improves the appearance of skin tone and texture with vitamins C & E.

BRAND STORY
Our advanced sun protection products provide a range of defense against UVA, UVB and infrared rays and also offer protective properties of antioxidants.
